POS 3 4,11

DLG a
I'm a cat

DLG d
All I've seen since I was made is this wall.

DLG f
I generate my own power so I could go anywhere. But I am too afraid to move.

DLG e
The conveyer must have turned on at the same time I woke up. But nothing is being made.

DLG A


DLG h
No one's ever assembled me.

DLG i
I wish I had a head.

DLG j
I can jump all day and all night, but I can't tell which is which because there are no windows.

DLG g
I am the smartest one in this room I should lead.

DLG k
I should be in charge here, oh ho ho ho

DLG m
I wouldn't mind being in charge.

DLG o
Everyone else is pretty useless

DLG p
I work well alone and in teams, so everyone should pick me.

DLG n
The recyclotron is the only way out.

DLG q
We need a leader. I have a suggestion if you'll hear me out.

DLG r
I can't decide. How can I decide our leader when I don't know what our purpose is?

DLG s
Am I biodegradable?

DLG t
I can't do much until someone else dies, and I can salvage their parts.

DLG u
Need to pick up something? I'm your robot!

DLG v
We're one of the nation's leading robotics factories. I just can't remember which nation.

DLG w
....error....error....error....error....error....error....error...error

END 0
Compacting redundant unit
